channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Elevating practitioner voices: Help shape the future Microsoft Entra community initiatives
item.description: At Microsoft Security, we believe the best communities are built with the people who use them every day. That’s why we want to hear from you. We’ve launched a quick survey to understand what matters most to identity and network security practitioners like you—your motivations, preferred platforms, and the types of content and connections that help you succeed. Your feedback will be used to inform how we shape Microsoft Entra community initiatives, from technical content and events to programs that truly support your work. Take the survey now and make your voice count. Thanks for helping us bui...
